If you're looking for a quirky and engaging indie film, I highly recommend "Zero Effect" (1998). This movie has a similar tone and style to what Emma tells, with its complex case of blackmail and mysterious investigation.

Alternatively, if you'd like something more contemporary and emotionally charged, "Blue Valentine" (2010) is an excellent choice. With its non-linear storytelling and powerful performances from Michelle Williams and Ryan Gosling, this film will keep you invested in the characters' lives.

Let me know if either of these piques your interest!
